item.title: Data Structures Part 1: Array & Linked List
item.description: Array Array is a data structure and it is a collection of elements or values. Each elment is identified by an array index/key. Advantages It is very easy to implement. Random access is O(1) if we know the array index or key. Disadvantages It is not a dynamic data structure. It would take O(N) if we want to insert or remove an element in the array.
